terms_title: USER AGREEMENT AND TERMS OF SERVICE

terms_section_2_content: YaM SOFT provides an automated examination and testing platform. This Service is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranties of any kind.
terms_section_3_content:
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, YaM SOFT AND ITS OPERATORS DISCLAIM ALL LIABILITY FOR:

YOU USE THIS SERVICE ENTIRELY AT YOUR OWN RISK.
